title: Efforts on to resolve business community’s problems: Dr Firdous
content:
SIALKOT, February 12:-:Special Assistant to Prime Minister on Information and Broadcasting Dr Firdous Ashiq Awan on Wednesday said the government was utilizing all available resources to address the problems of business community on priority basis.
Addressing the exporters and manufactures at Sialkot Chamber of Commerce and Industry (SCCI),
she said the Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) government was making efforts to keep the production wheel in full motion and generate maximum employment opportunities for skilled and semi-skilled youth.
“We understand that industrial sector can play an instrumental role in alleviating poverty from the country”, she said.
Dr Firdous said the government under the dynamic leadership of Prime Minister Imran Khan was making strenuous efforts for maintaining peace, prosperity and industrial development in the region.
The SAPM said exporters of Sialkot were roaming ambassador of Pakistan and it was their national obligation that they should project the soft image of Pakistan abroad.
She asked the business community that they should focus on enhancing export volume for strengthening the national exchequer.
Dr Firdous urged the business community to support Prime Minister Imran Khan for bringing radical changes in every sphere of life. Timely support of the business community to the prime minister would be much supportive in steering the country out of problems, she added.
She assured that special efforts would be made for resolving the issue of small industrial estate of Sialkot.
